item.title: Let's Encrypt and Go
item.description: Recently I implemented TLS using Let’s Encrypt for two Go applications. I thought I’d outline the process I followed and mention a couple of issues I had. Let’s Encrypt is a fabulous service. In making TLS freely accessible to the masses it’s helping make the Internet a more secure place. For Go applications, there’s no automatic install and renewal route, the process you follow to obtain a certificate takes you via the “standalone” option.
